summary.para: Performs a batch normalization on the input. This operator performs the following computation: Output = FusedActivation(Scale * ((Input - Mean) / sqrt(Variance + Epsilon)) + Bias).

Any dimension in MeanTensor, VarianceTensor, ScaleTensor, and BiasTensor can be set to 1, and be automatically broadcast to match InputTensor, but otherwise must equal the corresponding dimension's size from InputTensor.

member.name: DML_BATCH_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.InputTensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the Input data.

member.name: DML_BATCH_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.MeanTensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the Mean data.

member.name: DML_BATCH_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.VarianceTensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the Variance data.

member.name: DML_BATCH_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.ScaleTensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the Scale data.

member.name: DML_BATCH_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.BiasTensor
member.summary: A tensor containing the Bias data.

member.name: DML_BATCH_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.OutputTensor
member.summary: A tensor to write the results to.

member.name: DML_BATCH_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.Spatial
member.summary: TRUE to specify that locations are spatial, otherwise FALSE. Setting this to FALSE will require the Width and Height dimensions of MeanTensor and VarianceTensor to not be broadcast. This parameter was deprecated in DML_FEATURE_LEVEL_4_0, and has no effect.

member.name: DML_BATCH_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.Epsilon
member.summary: The epsilon value to use to avoid division by zero.

member.name: DML_BATCH_NORMALIZATION_OPERATOR_DESC.FusedActivation
member.summary: An optional fused activation layer to apply after the normalization. For more info, see Using fused operators for improved performance.
